strIntroduction: 厭倦了傳統的行程，想體驗新鮮元素？首爾時尚風情一日遊，感受這座城新奇浪漫的一面！將前往首爾商務金融中心德黑蘭路、韓流明星時常光顧的時尚流行最前線—新沙洞林蔭道、首爾最大的地下商場—COEX Mall以及COEX水族館，這些都是年輕人的最愛。
strTitle: 【流行時尚殿堂】韓國首爾時尚風情一日遊，新沙洞 COEX水族館 仁寺洞

strIntroduction: 從曖昧到穩定交往都適合的，couple約會首選餐廳，飽覽首爾市中心美麗景緻的同時享受一流的服務和高品質美食。＂今天我要和你一起在雲海中約會＂，與另一伴漫步在雲端，一同享受高水準的美食吧！
strTitle: 【我要在雲海中與你約會】首爾Top Cloud雲端餐廳自助餐券

strIntroduction: 看著海景，吃濟州島最新鮮的海鮮，還可以品嚐當地人做的醬蟹和小菜！優惠的價格享受美食～
strTitle: 【新鮮美食饕客】韓國濟州島西歸浦雲海生魚片餐券

strIntroduction: 這次的韓國旅遊是跟誰來的呢？是背包客獨自旅行、跟三五好友一同出國，還是和心愛的另一半享受難得的甜蜜旅行呢？＂戒指大學戒指工坊＂除了能夠手做純銀戒指外，純銀手鍊、項鍊也都全包下了！想替這次的旅行留下紀念嗎？來戒指大學準沒錯！
strTitle: 【閃閃發亮戒指村】 韓國首爾，獨一無二手作體驗

strIntroduction: 來韓國想去的地方太多不知道從何下手？景點間距離太遠，時間都花在交通上面了？一日遊的行程讓你在最短的時間把最Hot的景點都走一遍！從帥氣的換崗儀式、傳統人文風景的仁寺洞到最浪漫的N首爾塔...趁這次讓自己和首爾談場戀愛吧！
strTitle: 【和首爾談戀愛】深深愛上你，韓國首爾甜蜜一日遊

strIntroduction: 精選浪漫優雅的行程。在歐洲風情的翡翠花園散心，貴婦聚集地清潭洞感受高貴氣息，新沙洞的特色商店，喝杯咖啡享受文青的一日，淬煉心靈的另一境界～
strTitle: 【那年冬天風在吹】江原道翡翠花園 清潭洞咖啡廳 新沙洞一日遊

strIntroduction: Avoid the queues and early morning ticket fighting and guarantee your place on two of the most well-known Alishan Mountain train rides: The main Alishan Forest Railway line (Fenqihu Station - Chiayi Railway), the Zhushan line (the highest railway in Taiwan), and other famous attractions such as Alishan Sacred Tree and Sisters Lakes. strIntroduction: Well-known scenic sites in Taipei's Northeast include: Yehliu, Jiufen, and Shifen. Want to see the famous Queen’s Head at Yehliu in the morning? Savor taro at Jiufen for lunch? And light up sky lanterns at Shifen in the afternoon? There's also the famous Vigor Kobo DIY pineapple cakes! It all makes for the perfect one-day Taipei trip.
strTitle: 1-day tour around Yehli, Jiufen, Shifen

strIntroduction: This 10 hour Taipei charter tour Gives you even more! Survey the north coast on this incomparable bus tour. Visit Wan Li Jade Bay, Queens Head Rock and other geological sites in Ye Liu. Stop at great photo opportunities like the rock groves in Shimen (at Lao Mei Shi Cao) and of course "Turtle Roar Harbor" (Gui Hou Harbor), where you can get fresh seafood at set prices. And let's not forget a visit to the North Coast Cafe For a relaxing "tea time" while you enjoy the coastal scenery. Coming to Taipei doesn't mean you have to be in a rush. This bus tour gives you 10 hours of sites at a leisurely pace.
strTitle: 10-hour chartered Taipei day tour

strIntroduction: The most beautiful sunset is Taiwan is known to shine over the Gaomei Wetlands. The wind farms seem like an array of windmills set amidst the Wetlands, whose beautiful sunsets seem like they are right out of a Gauguin painting. It is an immensely pleasing experience and couples inevitably find it to be unforgettable! Tours are available daily! ！

strIntroduction: Visit the five wonders of Alishan in one trip: the kaleidoscopic views of Alishan’s famous sunrise, the vast expanse of clouds, and colorful sunset, surrounded by towering forests and the world famous Alishan train.

strIntroduction: The latest craze in the Japanese media is the new attraction of the beautiful Blue Hole in the Penghu islands. Even if you are only going to visit Penghu just to see the Blue Hole it is worth it!

strIntroduction: Taitung's hot air balloon experience gives you the choice of going up in a moored (anchored) hot air ballon or the freedom of flight (Free-Flight) which will not only allow you to fly like a bird but will also give you a 360 degree "birds eye" view of Taitung's Valleys, allowing you to enjoy Taitung's beautiful, bright and colorful sunrises. strIntroduction: As Taiwan’s Northeastern coastline comes into view enjoy the blue sky and picturesque white clouds, as you take in the special Nanyaqiyan rock formation with its weathering and marine abrasion formed geological landscape of Bitoujiao, and experience all the Northeast corner’s beautiful scenery along the coastline, as you chase the ocean breeze!

strIntroduction: Do you remember Takuya Kimura's short clip on tourism in Taiwan? It was filmed on location at the Volando Urai Spring Spa & Resort. strIntroduction: A place not to be missed when in the vicinity of Taipei — welcome to the fantastic wonderland of Thousand Island Lake. Its name was derived from Qiandao Lake in Mainland China. The area was formed by the surrounding Feitsui Reservoir and Beishi River, giving it the impression of many mountains when looking down from the Yong'an Mountain Trail. Bays of green waters are nestled among the luscious and serene mountains while the Ba Gua Tea Garden beckons visitors over. Thousand Island Lake has everything you’d want in a vacation in Taiwan!
strTitle: Shiding thousand island lake, Ba Gua tea garden and Shiding Old street 1-day tour

strIntroduction: Tour the north coast and enjoy the ever-changing geological landscape of Yehliu as you bear witness to the full force and magic of Mother Nature. Then take in the sights and sounds of Tamsui Old Street and go on a walking tour of the Juming Museum. Escape to the north coast and leave the stress and noise of city life behind and be enchanted by the beauty of nature!
strTitle: 1-day tour around Yehliu, Tamsui and Juming Museum

strIntroduction: The hot days of summer are the perfect season to see the Orange Day Lily (also known as the Lotus) which blooms at dusk (and sheds its pedals in the daylight) in Fuli's Sixty Stone Mountains. Appreciate the golden flowers, gently swaying in the breeze, under the blue skies. It's a great opportunity to take in all of nature as you appreciate this wonderful flower.
strTitle: 1-Day trip to Hualien's Sixty Stone Mountains (Taitung starting point)

strIntroduction: The only way to experience the oceanic lifestyle is to take a ferry ride to Green Island! If you are lucky, you might be able to see flying fish, dolphins while you on board of the ferry to the beautiful Green Island.

strIntroduction: How can you miss skin diving if you come to Kenting? Look at the colorful underwater seaworld of Kenting, even if you don't know how to swim, just put on the skin diving gear, follow our instructor's orders, and you can easily relax and explore the beautiful seaworld of Kenting.

strIntroduction: If you desire to directly travel to central Taiwan, and avoid the longer northern route, you can select either direction of the Hualien route which goes straight from Cingjing or Hualien bed and breakfast inns, to Wuling and Taroko Gorge, then direct to Cingjing or Hualien bed and breakfast inns or hotels. strIntroduction: This two-day, one-night itinerary, is a relaxing journey in which you can leisurely cycle through the beautiful, mountainous scenery. strIntroduction: The East Rift Valley is the geographical landform in between the Central Mountain Range and the Coastal Mountain Range. Standing below the high mountain range, you will find the East Rift Valley seems like a picturesque poetry. The magnificent view will take you away from reality. This trip starts off from your place of stay in Hualien, and will bring you to all MUST SEE scenic spots in Hualien.
strTitle: 1-day tour around East Rift Valley

strIntroduction: 玩高雄好方便，旗津夕陽、六合夜市一次玩透透！還有四小時速遊方案，讓忙碌的人也可以稍微放鬆一下！
strTitle: 【旗津夕陽】高雄市區包車一日遊/半日遊

strIntroduction: In the sparkling summer at Green Island, you can see tourists in Tee shirts and shorts exploring this island under the tropical sun, many others get on a scooter and explore the island riding through mountains and along the sea, let's go for a skin diving, hot spring and sunrise watching experience with this exciting tour.
strTitle: Green Island Skin Diving 2-Days Package Tour

strIntroduction: Sun Moon Lake is the must visit scenic site in Taiwan, you will stop at every angle of the lake to admire its beautiful scenary, in this tour we will take you on a boat ride, a bicycle tour around the lake and a cable car ride to enjoy the beauty of Sun Moon Lake enabling you to deeply understand and admire Sun Moon Lake in all its angles and scopes.
strTitle: Nantou Sun Moon Lake Bicycle Round Trip , Ferry Ride and Sun Moon Lake Cable Ride One Day Tour

strIntroduction: Visit all the must see scenic sites at Hualien. From the magnificent Taroko National Park to the beautiful Seven Star Lake, you can go anywhere you want on a 10- hours chartered bus. Enjoy the flexibility of the trip and decide your destination on your own.

strIntroduction: Convenient shuttle roundtrip! Not only saving your money, No more wasting time with public transportation! Come join us a ride!

strTitle: 8-hour chartered Kenting day tour

strIntroduction: Enjoy the mountain peaks surrounded with the rosy red sun at dusk amidst the sea of clouds, as you encounter Alishan’s mysterious and mystical Giant Tree Plank Trail, where you will feel just how tiny humanity seems compared to Mother Nature’s grandeur. Enjoy your trip with our professional Tour Guide through this amazing forest path.
strTitle: Tour around Alishan Giant tree plank trail and forest railway.

strIntroduction: Taitung's Taimali Lily Mountain has become famous for its fields of lilies. Every year, from August to October, at an altitude of 800-1400 meters, this incredible bloom covers the mountain from top to bottom. Looking down from Wangyou Gorge the horizon is filled with a sea of golden flowers. This bloom happens once a year and is an absolute can not miss. You must make a vacation out of Taitung's spectacular Lily bloom.
strTitle: Taitung's Taimali Lily Mountain Half Day Charterd Tour

strIntroduction:
Classic Taichung night tour including Feng Chia night market, maple garden, Taichung Metropolitan Opera House and more!

Get ready for a awesome night out in Taichung city!
strTitle: Classic Taichung Night Tour（Pick up service and English guide included）

strIntroduction: Come and have a thrill jeep ride as you conquer the bumpy sand dunes at Aberdeen Desert in Manjhou, Kenting! This activity is led by a group of professional instructors who will drive with you for a thrilling ride on large wheels jeep as you whip across the perilous sand dunes. This is as thrilling as a roller coaster ride where you would be driven up a five story high sand dune, the descent is a sharp 75 degrees drop, the instructors will control the speed of the jeep according to the age of the passengers, so adults and children can both enjoy this thriller.
strTitle: Jeep riding adventure at Manjhou Kenting

strIntroduction: Realize your highest dreams when you paraglide in Hualien. Enjoy a bird’s eye view of the entire East Rift Valley, as you soar into the sky and take in the beautiful skyline.
strTitle: 【Flying high in Hualien】Fantastic Paragliding Experience in Hualien

strIntroduction: The coolest thing you could do this summer is nothing but carrying an oxygen tank and diving into the colorful sea world of Green Island to discover all the magnificent and beautiful corals, fish, and shells that you've never seen. Apart from vast sea and blue sky, Green Island also has three world-class diving sites - Shih-lang, Chai-kou, and Dabaisha, and they will definitely leave you unforgettable memories once you come to see it by yourself.
strTitle: Green Island Discover Diving 3-Days Package Tour

strIntroduction: Lying on the luxurious green grassland with the gently brush of wind on your face, enjoy the view of Cing Jin Veterans Farm that was built like a European chateau with herds of sheep grazing and strolling lazily on the pasture, while looking at the overlapping moutain ranges and white clouds, chase and run around with the little sheep and don't forget to take pictures of this beautiful scenary and action, this is one of the most relaxing tour that you would definitely enjoy.
strTitle: Cingjing Farm one-day Trip (Depart from Taichung)

strIntroduction: Alishan cannot be reached by trains. Is taking public transportation the only way? KKday offers you a new option - shared-shuttle service. It's super convenient! Seats are limited daily. Buy it now!
strTitle: Shuttle service between Chiayi Fenqihu to Alishan

strIntroduction: The only way to experience the oceanic lifestyle is to take a ferry ride to Orchid Island! If you are lucky, you might be able to see flying fish, dolphins while you on board of the ferry to the beautiful Orchid Island.
strTitle: Orchid Island Ferry Ticket (Departing from Houbihu Kenting or Fugang Taitung)

strIntroduction: This brand new created Monster Village will take you on an illusive journey as though you have walked into the traditional land of Japan, this village built in Japanese style , the monsters are not scary at all, but cute and adorable, it is a fun place for adults and children.
strTitle: Nantou Monster Village Xitou one-day tour

strIntroduction: It's a must to enjoy a dip in the world-class salt-water hot spring if you come to Green Island. The outdoor Zhaori Hot Spring is the perfect spot for watching the sunrise in Green Island. Let's enjoy the hot spring while watching the sun rises from the sea level afar, and savor this wonderful moment together! . . The package includes ferry tickets, accommodation, and motorcycles as transportation vehicles, ensuring you an easy breezy 3 days 2 nights trip in Green Island.
strTitle: Green Island Jhaorih hot spring 3-Days Package Tour

strIntroduction: New shuttles routes limited daily. It's a new way of traveling, allowing you to go anywhere you want! After seeing sunrise in the morning, you will be at Sun Moon Lake in the afternoon.
strTitle: Shuttle service between Alishan to Sun moon lake

strIntroduction: Go sea scuba diving! Our professional instructors will scuba dive with you to explore the sea bottom, forget all your worries and enjoy this relaxing and wonderful moment as you are surrounded by the ocean.
strTitle: Boat scuba diving at Houbihu, Kenting (Free shuttle service)

strIntroduction: Hualien Taroko is the work of Mother Nature. The impressive ravine has been through ten million years of wind and water erosion. Walk on the Taroko trail, you will see the Eternal Spring Shrine, which is a Chinese style architecture, and the spectacular scene of numerous small caves appearing on the walls called The Swallow Grotto. This 30-minute trail is the essence of Taroko. When visiting Taroko, be sure to spend a day or half a day to enjoy the majestic scenery.
strTitle: Huailen Taroko Gorge half day tour

strIntroduction: 你的時間只有短短半天可以參觀，KKday專屬為你提供四個小時速遊方案，適合短暫停留或商務客人的客製行程喔～
strTitle: 台北彈性包車・《4HR快閃台北》為短暫的你所準備

strIntroduction: What is river trekking? A magical combination of hiking swimming and rock climbing. Be sure to try it out on this trip to Hualien!
strTitle: 【The King of River】The Adventure of River trekking in Hualien

strIntroduction: Enjoy two islands in one trip! Explore the paradise-like scenery in Orchid Island and Green Island in this 3 day 2 night trip, including a night visit to the owls in Orchid Island, an experience to the rare Zhaori Salt-Water Hot Spring, and a chance to scuba dive into the beautiful sea world of Green Island. The package comes with ferry tickets, rent motorcycles as transportation vehicles, and accommodation for you to enjoy the magnificent islands of eastern Taiwan easily and trouble-free.
strTitle: 3 Days 2 Nights Trip in Orchid Island and Green Island

strIntroduction: Apart from enjoying a hearty seafood feast, you can go skin diving too! You can experience all sorts of exciting and thrilling water activities. Kenting is definitely a spot where you should keep in mind! Spend an entire afternoon feasting on seafood and playing water activity in Houbihu. . .
strTitle: Skin Diving at Houbihu Kenting and Water activity of your choice

strIntroduction: Summer is the perfect time to visit eastern Taiwan. Come to Green Island, 50 minute away from Taitung, to see the clear and blue ocean, go for a nocturnal visit to find the wild Formosa Sika Deers, and enjoy an experience of world-famous salt-water hot spring. Moreover, you could ride bicycles through the field roads in Taitung, watching people paragliding in Luyah Gaotai, and in summer time, you could even see hot air balloons slowly rising up to the sky. A relaxing trip to eastern Taiwan is a must in the summer.
strTitle: 3 Day Package Deal including Scuba Diving in Green Island, and Chartered tour in Taitung

strIntroduction: Visiting Orchid Island is like visiting an exotic foreign country. The locals still follow the old customs and way of life. They even keep a local calendar. The Orchid Island 4 Day and 3 Night Excursion will allow you to soak in the local culture of Orchid Island as you circumnavigate the island on a motor scooter, becoming immersed in the island and its natural beauty. This trip covers all your needs, from transportation, to lodging and special tours. It will surely be an unforgettable journey.
strTitle: 4 days 3 nights package tour in Orchid island

strIntroduction: Alishan House is a top-class hotel with newly constructed exquisite suites on Taiwan's highest scenic spot. Staying in the Alishan House lets you feels at home, and brings you unforgettable memories.
strTitle: 2-day Alishan tour, staying at Alishan House

strIntroduction: Nowadays, barbecue is not a cuisine but a culture. It has even become an eating lifestyle in many countries. For decades, barbecue as an entertainment event has bonded families and friends in the most traditional way. Children rarely experience, fun catching shrimp in wild brook!
strTitle: 【Hulien Night life】River shrimping plus star light BBQ

strIntroduction: This is one of the trendiest water activities in Europe and America for the last three years, Hollywood superstar – Leonardo Dicaprio, international singer Rihanna are SUP players. SUP enables surfer to stand on board and paddling hand over hand, it is a highly safe activity and you can surf with ease whether you are on a river, lake or at sea as if you are walking on water.
strTitle: Kenting South Bay tidal force SUP paddles

strIntroduction: 花蓮的花東縱谷是全台灣最適合飛行輕航機的區域，從空中俯瞰台灣東部最天然與壯麗的景色。
strTitle: 花蓮輕航機體驗

strIntroduction: Want to travel to the outlying islands - Orchid Island and Green Island - in one time? Now you do not have to return to Fugang Fish Port in Taitung to do so. The recently launched ferry itinerary, limited for summer time from May to September, allows you to enjoy the two islands with only one ferry ticket. Without the limitation of using the ticket at the same day, you can choose to stay more days in Orchid Island or Green Island, and hop on the ferry according to ferry schedule. You can experience the totally different atmospheres on both islands with just one ticket.
strTitle: Ferry tickets for 3 days to travel around Taitung, Orchid Island and Green Island

strIntroduction: If you only have half a day in Taitung you can still have a great time! Visit the Waterfront Forest's International Landmark and art installations. Take a bike ride through Forest Park, then visit the musical enclave of Ironworks Village. These are Taitung's can't miss attractions.
strTitle: Half-Day Tour around Taitung's International landmark, Waterfront Park and Ironworks Village

strIntroduction: Taiwan is surrounded by the sea and there isn't a more beautiful coastline than on the east coast. No matter if your taking a local road through that vast expanse, coming from the south, passing through Taimali back to Taitung, or whether you are taking route 11 to Taitung, the east coast is brimming with a beautiful blue azure and incredible scenery, which changes with each passing season. If you don't want to spend too much on transportation, select the ride share trip. Have fun while you ride. A long distance road trip is a journey all its own.
strTitle: Along the coast : Hualien Kenting day tour (daily departure)

strIntroduction: 來去花蓮玩一天～ 全台唯一的海洋公園，就在花蓮～
strTitle: Theme Tour of Ocean Park (One-day tour)

strIntroduction: Due to Orchid Island's unique climate and environment (high temperatures and lots of rain and typhoons) as well as as it's reliance on its own resources, a unique dwelling has sprung from these factors "The Underground House." Upon arrival at Orchid Island a visit to The Underground House must be accompanied by either a professional tour guide or by a host. One cannot just go into The Underground House to take a peek or take pictures. If you want to experience this unique cultural landmark have a professional take you there to explore.
strTitle: 3 days 2 nights package tour in Orchid island
